Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning to help the Mets stun the Phillies and advance to the NLCS.
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets' long-time players celebrated their breakthrough to the NLCS, calling it a dream come true.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies struggled offensively, scoring just five runs in the series and hitting.186 overall.
The Tigers are just one win away from advancing to the ALCS.
Giancarlo Stanton hit a game-winning home run in the eighth inning to give the Yankees a 2-1 series lead.
Mookie Betts hit his third-straight first-inning home run in the series.
The Dodgers forced a Game 5 against the Padres with an 8-0 victory.
